Core idea

Quantum Therapeutic Touch blends intuitive touch-based practices and metaphors drawn from contemporary physics. While quantum mechanics demonstrates that matter and energy are interrelated at microscopic scales, therapeutic practices use "energy" as a functional metaphor to describe somatic and bioelectric phenomena that can be influenced by attention, touch, and context.

How it can help

  • Supports relaxation and autonomic regulation.
  • Provides a structured therapeutic ritual that enhances psychological safety.
  • Offers somatic practices and breathing techniques that correlate with measurable changes in heart rate variability and stress biomarkers.

Practical exercises

  1. 5-minute body scan daily (notice sensations without judgment).
  2. Grounding breath: 4s inhale, 6s exhale for 5 minutes before sleep or sessions.
  3. Two-minute hand awareness: rest hands gently, observe micro-sensations and note changes.
